item.description:
MOTHER'S DAY BRUNCH! This Sunday, May 8th 10am-4pm


A reminder that we are having another Live~Local~Organic Brunch at Alchemy featuring luscious live menu items and desserts, local products - and everything organic, of course featuring the amazing eggs from Hurricane Farm, and local greens from Urban Oaks - as well some special surprises to our yummy bliss-a-licious brunch!

Come check out the emergence of John's Bike Corner! See the selection of quality used bikes and sign-up for our upcoming bike tune-up workshop!


Some items from the brunch menu...
Live Quiche ~ Local Eggs with sprouted toast & rosemary potatoes ~ Love Alive's Raw Superfood Granola with almond mylk & fresh fruit ~ Vegan Pancakes with butter, real maple syrup & fresh fruit ~ Live Chia Porridge with fresh fruit & a dollop of nut creme ~ Sprouted Grain French Toast with butter, local maple syrup & fresh fruit ~ Succulent Sunday Salad ~ freshly baked muffins or scones ~ Live Pie of the day ~ Fresh OJ & Grapefruit Juice ~ Chaga Medicinal Superfood Elixir ~ Sprout Mama's wheatgrass & fermented veggies ~ Raw Chocolates and more...
item.why: In honor of the mamas - good food & good times
item.name: Mother's Day Brunch!
